title: Async Programming
description: Writing non-blocking code using `async` and `await` keywords with the Task-based Asynchronous Pattern (TAP). Async methods return `Task` or `Task<T>` and free threads during I/O-bound operations. Use `async` for network calls, file I/O, and database queries; avoid blocking with `.Result` or `.Wait()`.
shortDescription: Non-blocking code with `async`/`await` and Task-based patterns.
